data.title: PINKU PM AFFAIR UNFASIR TO GEISHA
data.meta_description: FOR most people who have never lived in Japan the country's two dominant images are the graceful, snow-capped silhouette of Mt Fuji, and the ornate, snow-white mask and elaborate kimono of the traditional entertainer, or geisha.
data.text:
FOR most people who have never lived in Japan the country's two dominant images are the graceful, snow-capped silhouette of Mt Fuji, and the ornate, snow-white mask and elaborate kimono of the traditional entertainer, or geisha.

Unfortunately for Japan, most foreigners also believe - erroneously - that the geisha are nothing more than high-class prostitutes.
